{"file":"third_party/managed/glfw/README.md","purpose":"Documents the optional GLFW drop-in structure.","exports":[],"depends_on":["third_party/managed/glfw/include","third_party/managed/glfw/lib","third_party/managed/glfw/bin"],"notes":["local_override_optional"]}
<!-- Human Summary -->
Place GLFW headers under `include/GLFW/` and platform libraries in `lib/` (plus DLLs in `bin/`) if you cannot install the dependency via a package manager. Files in this tree are ignored by Git except for `.gitkeep` placeholders.
